attributes.action: politely request on behalf of the the British people that Newcastle United FC name the Gallowgate Stand at St James Park after Sir Bobby Robson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like the Prime Minister to support our request to have the famous Gallowgate End at St James Park named after the "Legend" Sir Bobby Robson. 

This is the stand that he supported Newcastle United from as a young lad and the one that he brought so much joy to the "Toon Army" as a manager. 

It was here that he started to develop all the football knowledge and awareness that brought our Country so close to bringing home the World Cup in 1986 and 1990.

Thank you for your support.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
